roleset.name: to route incorrectly
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to route.

example.name: arg 1 only, passive
example.text: It is not uncommon for [property]-2 to be temporarily mislaid or misrouted *-2.

example.name: All args
example.text: He even took a great risk in rescuing a trainload of workers from Auschwitz-Birkenau after the SS had misrouted them to the camps for extermination.
